item.title: [CASSANDRA-12717] IllegalArgumentException in CompactionTask
item.description:
When I was ran LargePartitionsTest.test_11_1G at trunk, I found that this test fails due to a java.lang.IllegalArgumentException during compaction.
This exception apparently happens when the compaction merges a large (>2GB) partition.
